text: Victor Zue .Biography .Victor Zue is the Delta Electronics Professor of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science at MIT .In the early part of his career , Victor conducted research in acoustic phonetics and phonology , codifying the acoustic manifestation of speech sounds in American English .
